00056 //CPU power LED
00057 //On my Dev board this pin bootstraps the regulator so the power button can be released
00058 //On BOB this is the LED which lets you know the CPU is alive
00060 #define CPU_POW 2 //PORTD
00061 
00062 //addresses of the IGT I2C gyroscope

00064 #define GX_L    0x1E
00065 #define GY_H    0x1F
00066 #define GY_L    0x20
00067 #define GZ_H    0x21
